materials.raw_text:
Molybdenum (Mo): 90 g 
 Scandium (Sc): 30 g 
 Silicon (Si): 160 g 
 Titanium (Ti): 80 g

sourcing.instructions:
Molybdenum: Purchase from a metallurgical supplier or online platforms specializing in metals. 
 Scandium: Obtain from specialized chemical suppliers or rare earth metal vendors. 
 Silicon: Available at chemical supply stores or electronics suppliers. 
 Titanium: Sourced from metal fabrication companies or online metal suppliers.
